alert.note: Alert for Western Las Animas County Including Trinidad and Thatcher (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued November 23 at 3:59AM MST until November 23 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A Red Flag Warning is in effect for portions of the area from 11 AM through 6 PM Wednesday... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 PM MST THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 230... The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a Red Flag Warning for gusty winds and low relative humidity, which is in effect from 11 AM this morning to 6 PM MST this evening. * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zone 230. * Winds...Northwest 10 to 15 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 8 percent. * Temperatures...In the lower 50s.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Western Las Animas County Including Trinidad and Thatcher
